text: yatearu manusyannum avanre ullil allahu rantu hrdannaluntakkiyittilla. ninnal ninnalute matakkaleppealeyayi prakhyapikkunna ninnalute bharyamare avan ninnalute matakkalakkiyittumilla. ninnalilekk certtuvilikkappetunna ninnalute dattuputranmare avan ninnalute putranmarakkiyittumilla. ateakke ninnalute vaykeantu ninnal parayunna vakk matramakunnu. allahu satyam parayunnu. avan nervali kaniccutarikayum ceyyunnu
